text: THE DOOR IS LOCKED!!
WIPE YOUR FEET!!
BEFORE YOU SITS A SMALL WIZENED OLD
MAN DRESSED IN WHITE ROBES.
"THE KEY TO SUCCESS LIES BEYOND
THE DARKNESS.  FOR MORE CRYPTIC CLUES
SEE MY BROTHER."
AFTER DELIVERING HIS MESSAGE THE
OLD MAN DISAPPEARS.
AN ELDERLY SAGE WEARING A LOINCLOTH
IS SEATED IN A CORNER OF THE ROOM
CONTEMPLATING HIS NAVEL.  ON NOTICING
YOUR ARRIVAL HE LOOKS UP AND SPEAKS.
"WHEN YOU FEEL LIKE GIVING UP, TRY
2 STEPS FORWARD, 4 TO YOUR LEFT, 2
RIGHT AND FINALLY 1 STEP TO YOUR LEFT.
I WISH YOU LUCK.  CLOSE THE DOOR ON
YOUR WAY OUT."
THE SAGE RESUMES THE STUDY OF HIS
NAVEL.
YOU ARE IN A LARGE HALL.  THE WALLS
ARE LINED WITH CARVINGS OF FEARSOME
MONSTERS.
ON THE EAST WALL HANGS A TAPESTRY
DEPICTING SEVEN POWERFUL DEMONS.
A DISEMBODIED VOICE ECHOES THROUGH
THE ROOM.
"TAKE HEED OF THE MESSAGE OF THE
GREAT TAPESTRIES.  THE FATE OF YOUR
QUEST IS WOVEN INTO THESE WORKS!!!"
DON'T GIVE UP!
IF YOU STAND ANY CLOSER YOU'LL FALL
DOWN THE CHASM!!
THE SURROUNDING PASSAGE WALLS ARE
ROUGH AND UNHEWN.
YOU ARE IN A CAVERN.  IN THE NORTHWEST
CORNER DAYLIGHT IS COMING DOWN THROUGH
A HOLE IN THE CEILING, REVEALING A
CHASM IN THE CAVERN FLOOR.
DOTTED ABOUT THE CAVERN ARE A
NUMBER OF SMALL GNARLED TREES LEANING
TOWARDS THE WEAK SOURCE OF LIGHT.
A FINELY DETAILED TAPESTRY OF THE
FIVE CEREMONIAL GALLEONS OF THE
IMPERIAL NAVY HANGS FROM THE WALL IN
FRONT OF YOU.
THERE IS AN OPEN CHEST IN THE CORNER
IF YOU'RE LOOKING FOR DEATH YOU'VE
COME TO THE RIGHT PLACE. PLEASE ENTER.
IN FRONT OF YOU IS A TAPESTRY
REVEALING THE THREE CITY TOWERS IN ALL
THEIR SPLENDOUR!
THE PASSAGE WALLS ARE LINED WITH
GROTESQUE STATUES. ON THE FACE OF EACH
STATUE IS AN EXPRESSION OF ABJECT
TERROR.
THE EYES OF THESE STONE IMAGES SEEM
TO BE FOLLOWING YOUR PROGRESS.
IT IS VERY COLD HERE!!
BEFORE YOU IS A WALL-HANGING DEPICTING
THE SNOW-CAPPED TWIN PEAKS OF MELGAR,
THE HIGHEST MOUNTAIN IN THE KINGDOM.
THERE IS AN OBJECT EMBEDDED IN THE ICE
A WALL OF ICE BLOCKS YOUR PATH.
YOU ARE IN AN IMMENSE CAVERN. ITS SIZE
CAUSES THE PARTY TO FEEL DISORIENTED.
IT'S HOT HERE!!
THE ROOM IS FULL OF STEAM.  A FAMILIAR
OLD MAN IS RECLINING IN ONE CORNER
WITH A TOWEL WRAPPED AROUND HIM.
HE WIPES HIS BROW AND SPEAKS.
"HELLO AGAIN FRIENDS.  IF YOU WISH
TO SUCCEED IN YOUR QUEST YOU MUST
FIRST SLAY THE GUARDIAN OF THE REGIONS
OF FIRE.  THE WAY WILL BE HARD AND
FRAUGHT WITH PITFALLS.
IF YOU FEEL UP TO THE TASK TAKE THE
RIGHT DOOR.  IF NOT,TAKE THE LEFT AND
RETURN TO SAFER REGIONS.
WHEN THE CREATURE HAS BEEN
VANQUISHED SEEK MY BROTHER.  HE WILL
GIVE YOU THE REMAINING CLUES NEEDED TO
ACHIEVE YOUR GOAL."
THE OLD MAN VANISHES.
AN ELDERLY SAGE WEARING A LOINCLOTH IS
STANDING ON HIS HANDS IN THE CENTRE OF
THE ROOM.  ON NOTICING YOUR ARRIVAL HE
SCREAMS "AARGHH,MUD!!" AND RUNS OUT
THE DOOR.
THE PARTY IS FACING A FINELY WOVEN
TAPESTRY OF THE EIGHT MOONS OF THE
LAND.  'XARPOG' THE PALE BLUE ONE IS
PARTICULARLY FETCHING.
THE FLOOR OF THIS PASSAGE IS COVERED
IN MUD.
THE AIR HERE IS STALE AND DANK.
THE PASSAGE YOU ARE IN IS NARROW.
A BATTERED AND NEGLECTED SIGN ON ONE
OF THE WALLS READS:
***CATACOMBS***
*PLEASE DO NOT FEED THE VAMPIRES*
THE FLOOR LOOKS UNSAFE!!
THE PARTY IS IN A CHAMBER.  ENORMOUS
FADED AND ROTTING TAPESTRIES DEPICTING
BATTLE SCENES HANG FROM THE WALLS.
ONE PARTICULARLY IMPRESSIVE TAPESTRY
ON THE SOUTH WALL STANDS OUT FROM THE
OTHERS. THIS WORK SHOWS THE TWO ARMIES
OF THE EVIL LORD 'THUMORAK' AND KING
'MORKANDYL XII' LOCKED IN BATTLE.
YOUR WAY IS BLOCKED BY A WALL OF
SHIMMERING YELLOW LIGHT.
YOUR WAY IS BLOCKED BY A WALL OF
SHIMMERING BLUE LIGHT.
YOUR WAY IS BLOCKED BY A WALL OF
SHIMMERING RED LIGHT.
BEWARE OF FALSE PROPHETS!!
YOU ARE CONFRONTED BY AN APPARITION OF
A PORTLY SQUIRE.  HIS VOICE SOUNDS
FAMILIAR.
"WITHOUT THE ASSISTANCE OF MY LATE
MASTER 'KING MORKANDYL XII', YOUR
MISSION IS DOOMED TO FAILURE.  THE
BODY OF MY MASTER IS WELL HIDDEN.
AS YOU HAVE PROVED YOURSELVES WORTHY
OF KING MORKANDYL'S HELP I WILL GIVE
YOU THIS CLUE.
WHEN DARKNESS FALLS ON YOUR QUEST YOUR
GUIDANCE MUST COME FROM THE MESSAGE OF
THE GREAT TAPESTRIES.
WHEN YOU FIND MY MASTER YOU MUST BE
VERY CAREFUL.  HIS TEMPER IS SHORT,
AND WAKING HIM FROM MANY YEARS OF
UNDISTURBED REST IS SOMETHING WHICH
SHOULD NOT BE UNDERTAKEN LIGHTLY."
THE SQUIRE BOWS RESPECTFULLY AND
DISAPPEARS.
THE PARTY IS IN A LARGE RICHLY
DECORATED MAUSELEUM.
THE PARTY IS IN A CRYPT CONTAINING A
SINGLE STONE SARCOPHAGUS.  THE LID IS
CARVED IN THE SHAPE OF A MIGHTY
WARRIOR.  WITH A CREAK THE LID OPENS.
THE CRYPT IS SUDDENLY FILLED WITH A
POWERFUL PRESENCE.  A WARRIOR OF
MASSIVE PROPORTIONS STANDS BEFORE YOU.
THERE IS A LOOK OF DEATH AND MAYHEM IN
HIS EYES.  IN ONE SWIFT MOTION HE
BRANDISHES A LARGE GLOWING SWORD AND
BEGINS SWINGING IT ABOUT HIS HEAD.
AS THE PARTY PREPARES TO MEET AN
IGNOMINIOUS END THEY NOTICE A CHANGE
COME OVER THE WARRIOR.  HIS EXPRESSION
ALTERS TO ONE OF RECOGNITION AND IN
A KINDLY VOICE HE SPEAKS:
"THE PROPHETS FORETOLD THE DAY OF
YOUR ARRIVAL.  YOUR NEED FOR THE BLADE
OF MY FATHERS IS MUCH GREATER THAN
MINE. I TRUST IT WILL SERVE YOU WELL."
WHAT IS YOUR FAVOURITE COLOUR?
TO THE WEST A LONG STAIRCASE DESCENDS
INTO THE GLOOM.
YOU ARE AWARE OF AN ALMOST PALPABLE
WALL OF HATE EMINATING FROM NEARBY!!
YOUR WAY IS BLOCKED BY A WALL OF
SHIMMERING WHITE LIGHT
YOU STAND AT THE ENTRANCE TO A LONG
CAVERN. THERE ARE FRAGILE LOOKING
STALACTITES PROTRUDING FROM THE CEIL-
ING.  BE CAREFUL,IT WOULD BE A PITY TO
BE IMPALED AT THIS STAGE OF THE QUEST.
